name: Hippopotamus, Sacred
description: The Sacred Hippopotamus is a massive celestial creature with impressive natural armor and significant physical strength. It serves as a guardian of sacred sites, possessing a sleek, powerful form.
memorable: Its ability to teleport within sacred sites and unleash the Divine Cacophony makes it a formidable opponent and protector.
goals: To guard sacred spaces and heal allies while deterring rival worshipers.
relations: Related to other celestial beings; may serve deities or inhabit realms of divine protection.
environment: Usually found near sacred sites or places of worship.
strengths: Immunities to poison and conditions like charmed or frightened; significant magical resistance.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it more vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Gore melee attack that deals piercing damage and additional necrotic or radiant damage; uses Divine Cacophony to damage and stun enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Divine Cacophony, which deals heavy damage and stuns enemies in a wide area.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception score of 17.
skills: Excels in perception with a +4 proficiency.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for 30 minutes.
Ability to pinpoint locations of enemies or rival worshipers.
Uses magical attack for melee and enhances damage with necrotic or radiant options.
Can heal allies and cure ailments with Healing Rumble.
Teleportation ability visualized with either golden light or shadow tendrils.
test_queries: defensive hippo protecting a sacred site
